item.title: Mac Setup 2022
item.description: MacBook Pro Specification 13-inch Apple M1 Pro M1 2020 16 GB RAM 512 GB SSD QWERTY = English/Hebrew macOS Monterey (Update always) Homebrew Install Homebrew as package manager for macOS: ## paste in terminal and follow the instructions /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/HEAD/install.sh)" Update everything in Homebrew to recent version: brew update Add additional source for casks: brew tap homebrew/cask-versions Install GUI applications (read more about these in GUI Applications): brew install --cask \ google-chrome \ firefox \ visual-studio-code \ all-in-one-messenger \ sublime-text \ docker \ rectangle \ discord \ vlc \ figma \ grammarly \ macx-youtube-downloader \ notion \ postman \ tor-browser \ transmission \ utm \ viber \ yandex-disk \ zoom \ mongodb-compass \ disk-inventory-x \ obs \ spotify \ iterm2 \ deepl \ syncthing Install terminal applications (read more about these in Terminal Applications):
